channel.title: [Anonymous Competitive] - NewD3 - Mafia Wins!
channel.description:
![Chromatica cover|690x361, 100%](upload://iJNix907O5orF8KwMwj19AbEk7.jpeg) --- #
Welcome to NewD3, hosted by @KyoDaz
### Rules https://forum.imperium42.com/t/global-forum-discord-game-meta-rules-please-read-first/244 https://forum.imperium42.com/t/official-forum-mafia-and-forum-of-lies-rules/78926 ### Gameplay Phase length is 48/24. Actions are done by messaging me The mafia will talk through a private thread. Masons will talk through a private thread. Anonymous mode is active. Players must have an alternate account. The mafia's factional kill is optional and may be used simultaneously with another ability. A minimum of 20 game related posts is required per day. WotM is active. ### Executions To accuse someone say "**/jettison [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" Executions via majority will end the day early. Plurality is enabled. ### Possible Feedback [details="Feedback"] Rolecop - Your target is a [role]! Cop - Your target is aligned with the [alignment]! Tracker - Your target visited [player] last night! <> Your target visited [player] and [player] last night! Friendly Neighbor - [Player] is a Town Friendly Neighbor! Otherwise - You slept peacefully. [/details] ### Rolecards [details="Rolecards"] **Town** ># [color=green]Town Vanilla[/color] >You have no special abilities. > >*Defeat all threats to the Town.* ># [color=green]Town Cop[/color] >Every night you may choose to target someone to learn their alignment. > >*Defeat all threats to the Town.* ># [color=green]Town Doctor[/color] >Every night you may choose to target someone except yourself to protect them from nightkills. > >*Defeat all threats to the Town.* ># [color=green]Town Tracker[/color] >Every night you may choose to target someone to learn who they visited. > >*Defeat all threats to the Town.* ># [color=green]Town Friendly Neighbor[/color] >Every night you may choose to target someone to learn you are the Town Friendly Neighbor. > >*Defeat all threats to the Town.* ># [color=green]Town Jailkeeper[/color] >Every night you may choose to target someone to roleblock them and protect them from nightkills. > >*Defeat all threats to the Town.* ># [color=green]Town Mason[/color] >Your mason partner is [mason partner]. You have a private chat with them at all times. > >*Defeat all threats to the Town.* **Mafia** ># [color=red]Mafia Goon[/color] >Your mafia partner is [mafia partner]. You have a private chat with them at all times. > >*Defeat or gain parity over the Town.* ># [color=red]Mafia Roleblocker[/color] >Your mafia partner is [mafia partner]. You have a private chat with them at all times. >Every night you may choose to target someone to roleblock them. > >*Defeat or gain parity over the Town.* ># [color=red]Mafia Rolecop[/color] >Your mafia partner is [mafia partner]. You have a private chat with them at all times. >Every night you may choose to target someone to learn their role. > >*Defeat or gain parity over the Town.* [/details] ### To Join, Spectate or Backup [details="Join Information"] **To Join** To join, please message myself (@KyoDaz and @DatBird) for an alternate account. Please make sure you aware of the rules on alternate accounts before signing up. A pre-made alternate account will be assigned to you to ensure complete anonymity. Identity of alternate accounts will never be revealed to anyone unless moderator intervention is required and a behavioural rule is broken or a major game rule is broken such as intentional integrity breaches. This will always be done after the game except in extreme circumstances. *You must invite both me and DatBird to a DM if you wish to join.* **Spectators** Spectators may spectate by messaging myself with their desire of an uninformed chat. Informed chat is not authorised. **Backups** Backups may backup through messaging myself. You do not need to submit an alternate account application; we have backup accounts on hand. [/details] ### Setups: [details="Setup Details"] One row and one column is randomly selected. ![image|690x146](upload://rrTw150C36XtMnf4B856g9pURy2.png) * **A1** : Mafia Goon, Mafia Roleblocker vs. Town Cop, Town Doctor, 5x Town Vanilla * **A2** : Mafia Goon, Mafia Roleblocker vs. Town Jailkeeper, Town Tracker, 5x Town Vanilla * **A3** : Mafia Goon, Mafia Roleblocker vs. Town Mason, Town Mason, 5x Town Vanilla * **B1** : Mafia Goon, Mafia Rolecop vs. Town Tracker, Town Friendly Neighbor, 5x Town Vanilla * **B2** : Mafia Goon, Mafia Rolecop vs. Town Jailkeeper, Town Friendly Neighbor, 5x Town Vanilla * **B3** : Mafia Goon, Mafia Rolecop vs. Town Tracker, Town Doctor, 5x Town Vanilla * **C1** : Mafia Goon, Mafia Goon vs. Town Cop, 6x Town Vanilla * **C2** : Mafia Goon, Mafia Goon vs. Town Jailkeeper, 6x Town Vanilla * **C3** : Mafia Goon, Mafia Goon vs. Town Mason, Town Mason, 5x Town Vanilla [/details] Players: 1. Applause - Killed N2 - [color=green]Town Friendly Neighbor[/color] 2. Babylon - Jettisoned D1 - [color=green]Town Vanilla[/color] 3. Enigma 4. LoveGame - Killed N1 - [color=green]Town Tracker[/color] 5. Paparazzi - Jettisoned D2 - [color=green]Town Vanilla[/color] 6. Replay - Jettisoned D3 - [color=red]Mafia Goon[/color] 7. Shallow - Killed N3 - [color=green]Town Vanilla[/color] 8. Telephone 9. Venus ### Kills: [Day 1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/anonymous-competitive-newd3-day-2-7-9/82691/349?u=kyodaz) - Babylon [Night 1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/anonymous-competitive-newd3-day-2-7-9/82691/354?u=kyodaz) - LoveGame [Day 2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/anonymous-competitive-newd3-night-2-6-9/82691/567?u=kyodaz) - Paparazzi [Night 2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/anonymous-competitive-newd3-night-3-4-9/82691/569?u=kyodaz) - Applause [Day 3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/anonymous-competitive-newd3-night-3-4-9/82691/1275?u=kyodaz) - Replay [Night 3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/anonymous-competitive-newd3-day-4-3-9/82691/1276?u=kyodaz) - Shallow

item.dc:creator: Marshal
item.description:
yeah i’ve had 2 alt games and I’ve never slipped alt

The only time I got close was when I copied a link on marshal and then posted it on Frankie (and so it had the u=marshal at the end) but it ended up expanding so nobody saw

Read full topic

item.description:
It’s really not that hard to take care with alts lol. Just people be responsible and think for like half a second and if they keep mucking up then they cant use an alt anymore.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
What? It’s entirely possible. It’s not good to not implement something for bugs it could have.
Just run it in a testing environment before using it.
I’m sure a similar plugin already exists.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: KyoDaz
item.description:
Firekitten:

There probably is a way to add a plugin to discourse

Best plugin would be automatically posting as a certain account when on certain threads.
You wouldn’t need to change accounts.

Read full topic
